text: "Only Love Can Break Your Heart" is a 1970 song by Canadian singer Neil Young. It was taken from his third studio album After the Gold Rush. It went to number 33 in the United States. It has been covered by other artists. Saint Etienne covered it in 1990. That version went to number 39 in the United Kingdom and number 97 in the United States. ==References== Category:1970 songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Neil Young songs Category:Elkie Brooks songs Category:Saint Etienne (band) songs Category:The Corrs songs Category:Florence and the Machine songs Category:Natalie Imbruglia songs
title: Only Love Can Break Your Heart
